attributes.action: Vote  no confidence in this Tory Government we are being led into crisis.
attributes.additional_details: Our Government is supposed to protect its citizens and this Government has exposed it's people to the extreme likelihood of immense hardship.
attributes.background: I have been horrified by this Government's lack of understanding in the ordinary person's life and the referendum result for me was the last straw. The government has failed to protect its citizens from an unknown and desperate future and things should change. Enough is enough.
